DESCRIPTION: detects linear features in an image
creates shadow like areas;illumination is from the north-west
calculates the first derivative in x-direction (df/dx) per pixel
calculates the first derivative in y-direction (df/dx) per pixel
It calculates the first derivative in the downward diagonal direction (df/downward diagonal)
It calculates the first derivative in the upward diagonal direction (df/upward diagonal)
It calculates the second derivative in x-direction (d2f/dx2)
It calculates the second derivative in y-direction (d2f / dy2)
It calculates the second derivative in all diagonal directions (d2f/dxdy)
It calculates change in magnitude of the gradient in East direction for each pixel to extract edges from a two-dimensional image.
It calculates change in magnitude of the gradient in West direction for each pixel to extract edges from a two-dimensional image.
It calculates change in magnitude of the gradient in North direction for each pixel to extract edges from a two-dimensional image.
It calculates change in magnitude of the gradient in South direction for each pixel to extract edges from a two-dimensional image.
It calculates change in magnitude of the gradient in North-East direction for each pixel to extract edges from a two-dimensional image.
It calculates change in magnitude of the gradient in North-West direction for each pixel to extract edges from a two-dimensional image.
